Name: City Escaper
About the game: City escaper is a game based on a gangster escaping from police. City Escaper is a 2D game, dodge the obstacles, run away as long as you can and beat your own highscore! - Every round you play is randomly generated, no repeating rounds. - Smooth gameplay without any lags - includes highscores, with challenging rounds and obstacles
